title: Cloudinary Settings
description: Settings used for integrating with Cloudinary as the media service for a season

cloud_name.description: The cloud name for your cloudinary instance, also called the product environment

api_key.description: The API Key, found under Settings > Access Keys

api_secret.description: The API Secret, found under Settings > Access Keys

root_folder.description: The path value of the root folder used as the root for the season
